dependencies.dependency: TASK-032: Integration Tests for Advanced Features

task.description: Write comprehensive Javadoc documentation for all public APIs, classes, and methods. Documentation should include descriptions, parameters, return values, exceptions, and usage examples.

acceptance-criteria.criterion: All public classes have class-level Javadoc
All public methods have method-level Javadoc
Code examples in Javadoc for main API classes
Generated Javadoc is readable and well-formatted

implementation-notes.note: Focus on public API classes: - PdfGenerator and Builder - PdfOptions and Builder - ChromeOptions and Builder - PageOptions and Builder - WaitStrategy and implementations - All exception classes
Configure maven-javadoc-plugin to fail on warnings
